document.title: Rights, Liberties and Ideals: The Contributions of Milton R. Konvitz (Full Text)
document.abstract: Milton Konvitz (Ph.D. '33) embodied the spirit of Cornell University. An authority on civil rights and human rights, and constitutional and labor law, he served on the Cornell faculty for 27 years, holding dual appointments at the Law School and the School of Industrial and Labor Relations.
